forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered showers and thunderstorms, especially during the morning. High 23C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms, especially during the morning. High 73F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 66F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 69F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
